title: Guerrilla Bob PC (ENG)
description:
=====================================================================================

Guerrilla Bob needs your help to crack down on vile enemies . The game offers stunning visuals , an arsenal of weapons of Kick-Ass , unique enemies , explosive ammunition and non-stop humor . Bob can collect money from the enemies and use them in the shop to unlock a huge variety of weapons. Immerse yourself into this humorous military shooter with an original soundtrack and professional voice overs. 


====================================================================================

                             Genre : Arcade
                Developer : Angry Mob Games Publisher
                           Language : English
